DOC.brief_summary: The investigators will evaluate the effects of an exercise program (walking on a treadmill) on the physical performance, the cardiorespiratory function, the proclivity to heart arrhythmias and the quality of life of patients with severely impaired left ventricular function and a bi-ventricular resynchronization pacemaker.
DOC.brief_title: Exercise in Patients With a Biventricular Pacemaker
DOC.criteria: Left ventricular failure Resynchronization therapy with a biventricular pacemaker Ability to understand written German Age over 75 years Severe cardiac arrhythmia All conditions which can be aggravated by an exercise program
